title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 275.1 - Parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 275.1 - Parties

State Regulations

The party commencing an appeal shall be known as petitioner
and any adverse party, as respondent. After an appeal is commenced in
accordance with these rules, no party shall be joined or be permitted to
intervene, except by leave or direction of the Commissioner of

Education. Notes

275.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
